import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import'../assets/users.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Users=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);const[editData,setEditData]=useState({name:'',email:'',_id:''});useEffect(()=>{fetchUsers();},[]);const fetchUsers=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:8002/api/view-user`);const data=await response.json();setUsers(data.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching users:",error);}};const fetchUserProfile=async userId=>{try{await fetch(`http://localhost:8002/api/user-profile/${userId}`);// Previously setSelectedProfile(data); removed since it's unused
